\center \textbf{Первая задача} \center
![](../../data/26-23.png)

```{python}
file = open('../../data/26-files/26-k3.txt', encoding='utf-8')

_, k, m = map(int, file.readline().split())

scores = map(int, file.readlines())
sorted_scores = sorted(scores, reverse=True)

wins = sorted_scores[:k]
sorted_scores = sorted_scores[k:]
pre_wins = sorted_scores[:m]

file.close()

print(min(wins), min(pre_wins))
```

\center \textbf{Вторая задача} \center
![](../../data/26-89.png)

```{python}
import itertools

def find_couples(n, nums):
    couples = []
    cur_n = n
    ind = 0
    while ind != (len(nums) - 1):
        if nums[ind] - cur >= 3:
            couples.append((cur, nums[ind]))
            cur = nums[ind]
        ind += 1
    return couples


file = open('../../data/26-files/26-89.txt', encoding='utf-8')

nums = sorted([int(n) for n in file.readlines()[1:]])  # ()

min_first = float('-inf')
max_len = float('-inf')
for ind, n in enumerate(nums, start=1):
    if ind == len(nums):  # ()
        break

    couples = find_couples(n, nums[ind:])  # ()
    couples = itertools.chain(*couples)
    couples = tuple(set(couples))

    if couples:
        if len(couples) > max_len:
            min_first = couples[0]
            max_len = len(couples)

file.close()
print(min_first, max_len)
```
